tool_description: News and sentiment analysis API with close to half a billion records for financial and general service customers
name: Diana News and Analysis
title: Diana News and Analysis

api_list.name: Counts
api_list.description: Lists the number of articles by day, hour, or minute for the search term.

required_parameters.name: date
required_parameters.description: Four digit year, two digit month, and two digit day

required_parameters.name: time-period
required_parameters.description: One of daily, hourly, or minutes.

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://diana-news-and-analysis.p.rapidapi.com/counts/daily/20180101/keyword"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "diana-news-and-analysis.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://diana-news-and-analysis.p.rapidapi.com/counts/{time_period}/{date}/{search_term}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "diana-news-and-analysis.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Date
api_list.description: Lists all of the dates that have an article match for a search term.  These results can then be used for the other access points.

required_parameters.name: date
required_parameters.description: Four digit year and two digit month

required_parameters.name: Date
required_parameters.description: Four digit year and two digit month

api_list.name: Articles
api_list.description: Lists all of the articles and scores for one or more search terms.  This endpoint accepts up to four search terms.  Search terms should be added to the end of the request string with a forward slash (e.g., /articles/20190101/search-term-one/search-term-two/search-term-three/search-term-four)

required_parameters.name: date
required_parameters.description: Four digit year, two digit month, and two digit day

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://diana-news-and-analysis.p.rapidapi.com/articles/20180101/currency"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "diana-news-and-analysis.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://diana-news-and-analysis.p.rapidapi.com/articles/{date}/{search_term}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "diana-news-and-analysis.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
